meanings.definition: The act of achieving more than is expected or required.
meanings.sent1: Her constant overachievement in school made her stand out among her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The team's overachievement in the competition surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: His overachievement in eating all the cookies at once was both impressive and concerning.
meanings.sent4: The company's overachievement in sales this quarter exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The student's overachievement in the science fair earned them a special award.

meanings.definition: To perform better or achieve more than expected or desired.
meanings.sent1: She always overachieves in her exams by studying diligently.
meanings.sent2: I hope to overachieve in my presentation to impress my boss.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel managed to overachieve in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's determination helped him overachieve in the marathon.
meanings.sent5: The chef's creativity allowed him to overachieve in preparing a unique dish.
